limit.fieldDescription: Maximum number of items displayed in list
limit.name: ./limit

parentPage.fieldDescription: Leave empty to use current page
parentPage.name: ./parentPage

ancestorPage.fieldDescription: Leave empty to use current page
ancestorPage.name: ./ancestorPage

pages.fieldDescription: Click the '+' to add a new page

parentPage.fieldDescription: Leave empty to use current page
parentPage.name: ./tagsSearchRoot

searchIn.fieldDescription: Leave empty to use current site (eg. /content/mysite)
searchIn.name: ./searchIn

detailsBadge.fieldDescription: Which badge to select from the Details component on the page
detailsBadge.name: ./detailsBadge

printStructure.fieldDescription: Don't print structure of the list, omit (OL/UL and LI tags)
printStructure.name: ./printStructure

showHidden.fieldDescription: pages with selected Hide in Navigation will be hidden
showHidden.name: ./showHidden

listSplit.fieldDescription: break list after number of items
listSplit.name: ./listSplit

listSplitEvery.fieldDescription: break list after this number of items
listSplitEvery.name: ./listSplitEvery

titleIcon.fieldDescription: When showing this page links show this Icon
titleIcon.name: ./titleIcon

cardIconShow.fieldDescription: show icon instead of page image
cardIconShow.name: ./cardIconShow

cardIcon.fieldDescription: When showing this page as card badge use this Icon
cardIcon.name: ./cardIcon

cardStyle.fieldDescription: Apply this style to card badge
cardStyle.name: ./cardStyle

cardSize.fieldDescription: this will be used as card size in grids
cardSize.name: ./cardSize

badgeTitleType.fieldDescription: which paragraph tag to use for Badge Title display
badgeTitleType.name: ./badgeTitleType

badgeTitleTrimLengthMax.fieldDescription: crop Title text after this many characters
badgeTitleTrimLengthMax.name: ./badgeTitleTrimLengthMax

badgeTitleTrimLengthMaxSuffix.fieldDescription: add the following text as suffix when cropping Title
badgeTitleTrimLengthMaxSuffix.name: ./badgeTitleTrimLengthMaxSuffix

badgeSummaryLengthMax.fieldDescription: crop Summary text after this many characters
badgeSummaryLengthMax.name: ./badgeSummaryLengthMax

badgeSummaryLengthMaxSuffix.fieldDescription: add the following text as suffix when cropping Summary
badgeSummaryLengthMaxSuffix.name: ./badgeSummaryLengthMaxSuffix

badgeLinkTarget.fieldDescription: how should the link of items behave when clicked
badgeLinkTarget.name: ./badgeLinkTarget

badgeLinkText.fieldDescription: shows as a link visible text
badgeLinkText.name: ./badgeLinkText

badgeLinkTitle.fieldDescription: shows as a link alt title
badgeLinkTitle.name: ./badgeLinkTitle

badgeLinkStyle.fieldDescription: The type of button that should appear on the card
badgeLinkStyle.name: ./badgeLinkStyle

pageIcon.fieldDescription: Use this icon when icon is required for display
pageIcon.name: ./pageIcon

rendition.text: Rendition: pick a suitable image rendition

badgeThumbnailSize.fieldDescription: blank values are not added as attributes

badgeOverlayIcon.fieldDescription: When showing this page in a list show this icon for overlay
badgeOverlayIcon.name: ./badgeOverlayIcon

menuColor.fieldDescription: Color to be used for highlighting in Site Menu
menuColor.name: ./menuColor

menuIcon.fieldDescription: Use this icon for Icon badge
menuIcon.name: ./menuIcon

menuAccesskey.fieldDescription: Keyboard Access key to use in menu
menuAccesskey.name: ./menuAccessKey

tabIcon.fieldDescription: When showing this page in a tab show this Icon
tabIcon.name: ./tabIcon

animationEnabled.fieldDescription: Should the animation be enabled for this component?
animationEnabled.name: ./badgeAnimationEnabled

animationName.fieldDescription: The type of animation to run
animationName.name: ./badgeAnimationName

animationOnce.fieldDescription: Should the animation only run once? By default is runs everytime you scroll past the element on the page
animationOnce.name: ./badgeAnimationOnce

animationDelay.fieldDescription: How many milliseconds should occur before the animation runs?
animationDelay.name: ./badgeAnimationDelay

animationDuration.fieldDescription: How long should the animation run for? Minimum is '400' and the maximum is '3000'. Values must be in increments of 50, i.e. 450, 500, 550...
animationDuration.name: ./badgeAnimationDuration

feedType.fieldDescription: type of feed to show as icon
feedType.name: ./feedType

positions.fieldDescription: The X and Y values of the Position

animationEnabled.fieldDescription: Should the animation be enabled for this component?
animationEnabled.name: ./animationEnabled

animationName.fieldDescription: The type of animation to run
animationName.name: ./animationName

animationOnce.fieldDescription: Should the animation only run once? By default is runs everytime you scroll past the element on the page
animationOnce.name: ./animationOnce

animationDelay.fieldDescription: How many milliseconds should occur before the animation runs?
animationDelay.name: ./animationDelay

animationDuration.fieldDescription: How long should the animation run for? Minimum is '400' and the maximum is '3000'. Values must be in increments of 50, i.e. 450, 500, 550...
animationDuration.name: ./animationDuration

ariaLabel.fieldDescription: Defines a string value that labels the current element.
ariaLabel.name: ./ariaLabel

ariaRole.fieldDescription: Main indicator of type. This semantic association allows tools to present and support interaction with the object in a manner that is consistent with user expectations about other objects of that type.
ariaRole.name: ./ariaRole

ariaDescribedBy.fieldDescription: Identifies the element (or elements) that describes the object.
ariaDescribedBy.name: ./ariaDescribedBy

ariaLabelledBy.fieldDescription: Identifies the element (or elements) that labels the current element.
ariaLabelledBy.name: ./ariaLabelledBy

ariaControls.fieldDescription: Identifies the element (or elements) whose contents or presence are controlled by the current element.
ariaControls.name: ./ariaControls

ariaLive.fieldDescription: Indicates that an element will be updated, and describes the types of updates the user agents, assistive technologies, and user can expect from the live region.
ariaLive.name: ./ariaLive

ariaHidden.fieldDescription: Indicates that the element and all of its descendants are not visible or perceivable to any user as implemented by the author.
ariaHidden.name: ./ariaHidden

ariaHaspopup.fieldDescription: Indicates that the element has a popup context menu or sub-level menu.
ariaHaspopup.name: ./ariaHaspopup

ariaAccessKey.fieldDescription: Identifies the element (or elements) whose contents or presence are controlled by the current element.
ariaAccessKey.name: ./ariaAccessKey
